sentence: GuruFocus is excited to announce that we are now providing 30 years of fundamental data and valuation data for US companies!
We have also extended our calculation on the valuation data, so you can get 30 years of historical valuation data from GuruFocus.

The 30-year fundamental and valuation data are now available in all GuruFocus tools including:

1.
For example, 30-year of revenue chart for Procter & Gamble ( PG ) and Coca-Cola.
Excel download of 30-year financial and valuation data.
30-year financial data are not displayed in the financial page like this as there are too many data to display.
You can use the tools above to get these data or display in charts.

For instance, this is the net income and free cash flow of Amazon ( AMZN ) since its IPO:

Also the net income and free cash flow of Apple ( AAPL ):

The 30-year financial data is available for Premium Members.
You can learn more about GuruFocus Membership Features here.
